slides.title: Control Structures
slides.content:
# Control Structures üîÄ

## Conditionals
```
if condition:
    do_something
else:
    do_other
```

## Loops
| Type | Use |
|------|-----|
| for | Known iterations |
| while | Condition-based |
| do-while | At least once |

slides.title: Quiz
slides.quizQuestion: Which loop guarantees at least one execution?

slides.title: Functions
slides.content:
# Functions üìù

## Benefits
- Code reuse
- Modularity
- Abstraction

## Recursion
```
function factorial(n):
    if n <= 1: return 1
    return n * factorial(n-1)
```
